fullplot: Based on the true story of four friends who decide to install a communal pirate radio station called Rèdio Favela in a shanty-town, to give voice to the outcasts' complaints.
plot: Based on the true story of four friends who decide to install a communal pirate radio station called Rèdio Favela in a shanty-town, to give voice to the outcasts' complaints.
title: Something in the Air
